mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gen_table a
a.del_flag = '0'
AND a.name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.class_name = #{className}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gen_table( id, name, comments, class_name, parent_table, parent_table_fk, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{comments}, #{className}, #{parentTable}, #{parentTableFk}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gen_table SET name = #{name}, comments = #{comments}, class_name = #{className}, parent_table = #{parentTable}, parent_table_fk = #{parentTableFk}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
